member.name: POLICY_LSA_SERVER_ROLE
member.summary: The POLICY_LSA_SERVER_ROLE enumeration type defines values that indicate the role of an LSA server. The and functions use this enumeration type when their InformationClass parameters are set to PolicyLsaServerRoleInformation.

member.name: POLICY_LSA_SERVER_ROLE.PolicyServerRolePrimary
member.summary: Indicates a primary LSA server, a workstation, or a standalone computer.
